inclusion.criterion: Clinical cytology diagnosis of Bethesda category III (AUS/FLUS) pathological confirmation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: pathological confirmation of other thyroid carcinomas, including follicular carcinoma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: undifferentiated Spindle cell carcinoma and lymphoma were excluded
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: female who were pregnant were excluded
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients with mental disorders were excluded
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients without the complete clinical data were excluded
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and underwent XRT, which may be relevant for trial eligibility.
